function.name: display

long.para: display(x) displays the value of the argument, x, formatted in the style of value creation.

function.examples:
For example if you had previously created value y:
>> x = randm
x =
- 0.9401 e0 - 0.2775 e1 - 0.0973 e2 + 0.1723 e12
>> display(x)
x =
- 0.9401 e0 - 0.2775 e1 - 0.0973 e2 + 0.1723 e12
>> display(y)
y =
- 0.1855 e0 + 0.3149 e1 + 0.2783 e2 - 0.8882 e12
>> clifford_signature(1,1) >> x = randm(2)
x =
2x2 Cl(1,1) multivector array
>> display(x)
x =
2x2 Cl(1,1) multivector array
